root.name: Splinter Cell Trilogy
root.description: The collection is available on the PlayStation Network in North America much like the Prince of Persia Trilogy, and is also available as a retail disc. It is a collection of the first three Splinter Cell games which include Splinter Cell, Splinter Cell: Pandora Tomorrow, and Splinter Cell: Chaos Theory. The trilogy was developed from the PC versions of all the games.
